summary: Meeting focused on business goals and growth targets for Maxim. Discussion included current funding levels, future funding targets, and technology improvements. Team also discussed 8x8 system access and upcoming projects.
decisions: Laura to get administrative access to 8x8 system
action_items: Michael to provide Laura with 8x8 system access
Laura to set up 8x8 access after returning from holiday
Michael to share detailed business goals via email
Faye to send lunch to the office (playful commitment)
concerns: Delay in building out sales organization until operations are optimized
Uncertainty about hitting 51M target due to market conditions
michael_priorities: Ensuring technology and models are properly configured
Building sales organization after operations are optimized
commitments: Focus on process improvements and technology optimization
